text: The 2018–19 Russian Premier League (Russian: Чемпионат России по футболу 2018/2019, Chempionat Rossii po futbolu 2018/2019) will be the 17th Russian Premier League season, and the 27th top division football tournament. It will be played from 29 July 2018 to 26 May 2019.РФПЛ назвала дату старта следующего чемпионата России по футболу Lokomotiv Moscow are the defending champions. == Table == Summary - Premier League - Russia - Results, fixtures, tables and news - Soccerway Team Qualification or relegation 1 Zenit St. Petersburg 26 17 4 5 48 26 +22 57 2 Lokomotiv Moscow 26 14 7 5 38 24 +14 49 3 Krasnodar 26 13 7 6 46 22 +24 46 4 CSKA Moscow 26 12 8 6 36 18 +18 44 5 Spartak Moscow 26 11 7 8 32 28 +4 40 6 Arsenal Tula 26 10 9 7 34 27 +7 39 7 Orenburg 26 10 6 10 33 30 +3 36 8 Rostov 26 9 9 8 23 21 +2 36 9 Akhmat Grozny 26 9 8 9 24 27 −3 35 10 Ural Yekaterinburg 26 9 6 11 27 40 −13 33 11 Rubin Kazan 26 6 14 6 22 25 −3 32 12 Dynamo Moscow 26 6 11 9 21 21 0 29 13 Krylia Sovetov Samara 26 8 3 15 22 35 −13 27 14 Ufa 26 5 10 11 23 29 −6 25 15 Anzhi Makhachkala 26 5 5 16 12 44 −32 20 16 Yenisey Krasnoyarsk 26 3 7 16 18 43 −25 16 === Relegation play-offs === == Statistics == === Top goalscorers === 12 goals * Sardar Azmoun (Rubin Kazan/Zenit St. Petersburg) * Fyodor Chalov (CSKA Moscow) 9 goals * Viktor Claesson (Krasnodar) * Sylvester Igboun (Ufa) 8 goals * Artem Dzyuba (Zenit St. Petersburg) * Zé Luís (Spartak Moscow) * Anton Miranchuk (Lokomotiv Moscow) * Jefferson Farfán (Lokomotiv Moscow) == References == == Other websites == * *2018–19 Russian Premier League at Soccerway Category:2018–19 in European football Category:Russian Premier League Category:2010s in Russian sport
title: 2018–19 Russian Premier League
